about_the_game:
"Let's Patiti!" is a multiplayer party game that supports 2-4 players, available for both online and local play. In the game, you will play as an adorable little cat, engaging in a spirited chase and cunning competition with your feline friends or AI in the "Meow Meow Forest". Within the forest, you'll encounter a variety of random events on the map, collect all sorts of peculiar items, and use these items to engage in intense and thrilling mini-games. Finally, only by sprinting to the finish line with all your might in the forest can you achieve ultimate victory!

Important Notice: While our game supports online multiplayer over the internet, for the best gaming experience, we recommend gathering a few friends to play together over a local area network (LAN)!

Leisurely Seeing the Southern Mountain.

The lovely KK is waiting for you at the forest food cart.

Of course, we will play mini-games in the forest!
detailed_description:
Follow us

Dear players,

Thank you for your continuous support and enthusiastic feedback for our game. If you would like to learn more about the latest information, please follow our social media accounts:

Our official Xiaohongshu account: 独立游戏Let's Patiti!

Our QQ group: 106727313

We will continuously improve the gaming experience. Thank you for your understanding and support, and we wish you a pleasant time in the game!

The Patiti Team


About the Demo

"Let's Patiti!" is a multiplayer party game that supports 2-4 players, available for both online and local play. name: Let's Patiti! Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64 bit Windows 10、64 bit Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64 bit Windows 10、64 bit Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-11700KF
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 3060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: "Let's Patiti!" is a multiplayer party game that supports 2-4 players and can be played online or locally. In the game, you take on the role of an adorable little cat, engaging in a game of chase and cunning competition with your "Meow Meow" friends or AI in the "Meow Meow Forest".
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
